pullRequest.title: Update pom file version scanner and spring pom files.
pullRequest.bodyText:
There are two things in this PR:

The bannedDependency includes use the x-include-update tags. There was an error when the dependency type was current or dependency and the library either didn't exist in the version_*.txt files or was incorrectly tagged and should have been an external_dependency. I've fixed that and updated the error when that type of situation happens to be more clear. The error now shows as: Error: commons-io:commons-io's dependency type is 'current' but the dependency does not exist in any of the version_*.txt files. Should this be an external_dependency? Please ensure the dependency type is correct or the dependency is added to the appropriate file.
There were spring pom files sdk/spring/azure-spring-cloud-context/pom.xml and sdk/spring/azure-spring-cloud-telemetry/pom.xml that were incorrectly using the dependency type "current" for an "external_dependency"

commit.message: Update ver scanner and spring pom files
